bill.title: Alternative Fuels Technician Training Act; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The "alternative Fuels Technician Certification Act"; To Provide Certain Definition; To Establish The Committee Of Alternative Fuels Technician Examiners; To Provide That Uniform Examinations Shall Be Given To Individuals To Become Certified As Alternative Fuels Equipment Technicians; To Provide For Certain Fees; To Prescribe Recertification Guidelines; To Provide For An Alternative Fuels Technician Hearing Board; To Create An Alternative Fuels Technician Certification Revolving Fund; To Provide Certain Criminal And Civil Penalties; To Amend Section 53-1-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; To Bring Forward Sections 57-39-1 Through 57-39-43, Which Relate To The Energy And Transportation System; For Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
